text: Xaq jeriꞌ utz chujnoꞌjinoq are qabꞌana ri utzilal ri kaqabꞌano are tzijil ri qꞌij pa qawiꞌ, man are ta kaqilij upaqꞌik ri qapam, man are ta kaqilij qꞌabꞌarik, man are ta kaqabꞌan ri etzelal kukꞌ taq ixoqibꞌ o kukꞌ taq achyabꞌ, xuqujeꞌ man are ta kaqilij ukojik chꞌoꞌj xuqujeꞌ kꞌaxal chikixoꞌl taq ri winaq.
